lead_paragraph: A young man’s leg was severely wounded after he stepped on what investigators believe was part of a homemade firework that had been left behind, the police said.

byline.contributor: Annie Correal, Sandra E. Garcia and Sarah Maslin Nir contributed reporting.
byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and SAMANTHA SCHMIDT

headline.print_headline: Fireworks Suspected in Park Blast; Man Hurt
headline.main: Man Injured in Central Park Explosion

snippet: A young man’s leg was severely wounded after he stepped on what investigators believe was part of a homemade firework that had been left behind, the police said....
abstract: Tourist Connor Golden steps on explosive material in Central Park, setting off blast that severely injures his leg; police believe material was part of  homemade fireworks experiment and not terrorist device.
